issue.title: trying to download restricted product when not logged in returns a blank page
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When a user try to download a product with no session active a 401 http is returned; It should return the login page.
If the tmpl parameter is passed, it should transfer it to the login page.

We use it form the download link from the map.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
